name: SteamStatus
0:
”Alexa, ask Steam Status what the current status is”
”tell me if steam is up”
”what's the current steam status”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: steam status
des: Get the current status of Steam, without having to go to a website; Just ask Alexa!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
